name: Lord of the Leap Prototype
description:
Hello!

This is a first person platformer game I made for a 2 week challenge from a discord server. This is also my first post on Itch.io

The game is still pretty rough with features. There are hardly any menus and settings to change since I ran out of time. I might update the game if there is enough interest.

Controls:

W A S D for movement

Mouse for looking around

Shift to run

Hold space to jump. Jump direction is determined on what direction you are moving when letting go of space bar.
